card.name: Act of Heroism
card.property: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 until end of turn and can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "On every plane, there are those who run toward danger."—Gideon Jura

card.name: Adorned Pouncer
card.property: Double strike Eternalize {3}{W}{W} ({3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Cat with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Angel of Condemnation
card.property: Flying, vigilance {2}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. {2}{W}, {T}, Exert Angel of Condemnation: Exile another target creature until Angel of Condemnation leaves the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: Angel of the God-Pharaoh
card.property: Flying Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angels did not deceive. From the start, they were clear their allegiance was to the God-Pharaoh and to him alone.

card.name: Aven of Enduring Hope
card.property: Flying When Aven of Enduring Hope enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This storm will calm. We must believe that."

card.name: Crested Sunmare
card.property: Other Horses you control have indestructible. At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 5/5 white Horse creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is evidence that some pure corner of the world must still exist."—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

card.name: Dauntless Aven
card.property: Flying Whenever Dauntless Aven attacks, untap target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the chaos brought by the new gods, swift-winged aven served as pathfinders, leading the last of the people away from the ruins of Naktamun.

card.name: Desert's Hold
card.property: Enchant creature When Desert's Hold enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card.name: Disposal Mummy
card.property: When Disposal Mummy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the viziers to oversee their actions, some anointed went to extreme lengths to fulfill their directives.

card.name: Djeru, With Eyes Open
card.property: Vigilance When Djeru, With Eyes Open enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. If a source would deal damage to a planeswalker you control, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Djeru's Renunciation
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Cycling {W} ({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was promised an afterlife, not this. Samut was right. The God-Pharaoh lied."—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Buildings crumbled and monuments fell. The river bled and the sky wept tears of fire. All the while, servants silently continued their work, oblivious to it all.

card.name: Gideon's Defeat
card.property: Exile target white creature that's attacking or blocking. If it was a Gideon planeswalker, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gideon, how easy it must be to play the protector when you think yourself untouchable. How wrong you are."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: God-Pharaoh's Faithful
card.property: Whenever you cast a blue, black, or red spell, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the final trial! Rejoice, for the God-Pharaoh soars among us!"

card.name: Hour of Revelation
card.property: Hour of Revelation costs {3} less to cast if there are ten or more nonland permanents on the battlefield. Destroy all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the first moments, the gate to the afterlife opened, and the people were prostrate in the light of the God-Pharaoh.

card.name: Mummy Paramount
card.property: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, Mummy Paramount gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It appears some mummies have begun to observe a hierarchy all their own."—Elekh, vizier of embalming

card.name: Oketra's Avenger
card.property: You may exert Oketra's Avenger as it attacks. When you do, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oketra's arrow is my spear, and her love my shield."

card.name: Oketra's Last Mercy
card.property: Your life total becomes equal to your starting life total. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the end, all Oketra did was for others.

card.name: Overwhelming Splendor
card.property: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1. Enchanted player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities or loyalty abilities.

card.name: Sandblast
card.property: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sands of Amonkhet can be as much a boon as a bane. It depends entirely on which way the wind blows.

card.name: Saving Grace
card.property: Flash Enchant creature you control When Saving Grace enters the battlefield, all damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to enchanted creature instead. Enchanted creature gets +0/+3.

card.name: Solemnity
card.property: Players can't get counters. Counters can't be put on artifacts, creatures, enchantments, or lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The arrival of the God-Pharaoh marked a betrayal of both gods and mortals.

card.name: Solitary Camel
card.property: Solitary Camel has lifelink as long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Steadfast Sentinel
card.property: Vigilance Eternalize {4}{W}{W} ({4}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Cleric with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Steward of Solidarity
card.property: {T}, Exert Steward of Solidarity: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the midst of disaster, heroic acts became almost ordinary, and ordinary warriors became heroes.

card.name: Sunscourge Champion
card.property: When Sunscourge Champion enters the battlefield, you gain life equal to its power. Eternalize—{2}{W}{W}, Discard a card. ({2}{W}{W}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Unconventional Tactics
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. Whenever a Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, return Unconventional Tactics from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Vizier of the True
card.property: You may exert Vizier of the True as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.) Whenever you exert a creature, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Aerial Guide
card.property: Flying Whenever Aerial Guide attacks, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kefnet taught us to turn obstacles into advantages."—Neponem, vizier of Kefnet

card.name: Aven Reedstalker
card.property: Flash Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our best chance against the Eternals will be tactics they've never seen and styles they've never trained in."

card.name: Champion of Wits
card.property: When Champion of Wits enters the battlefield, you may draw cards equal to its power. If you do, discard two cards. Eternalize {5}{U}{U} ({5}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Countervailing Winds
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Eternals had long since mastered every technique taught during the trials.

card.name: Cunning Survivor
card.property: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Cunning Survivor gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Initiates who had been through the Trial of Knowledge learned to see everything as pieces of a larger puzzle.

card.name: Eternal of Harsh Truths
card.property: Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.) Whenever Eternal of Harsh Truths attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If creating the Eternals was Bolas's plan here, what is his plan for the Eternals?"—Jace Beleren

card.name: Fraying Sanity
card.property: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards put into that graveyard from anywhere this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those wound tightest are first to unravel.

card.name: Hour of Eternity
card.property: Exile X target creature cards from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To serve as an eternal is the afterlife granted to the worthy.

card.name: Imaginary Threats
card.property: Creatures target opponent controls attack this turn if able. During that player's next untap step, creatures he or she controls don't untap. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana always knew Jace's illusions would come in handy.

card.name: Jace's Defeat
card.property: Counter target blue spell. If it was a Jace planeswalker spell, scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I had hoped for more from you, Jace. But I expected as much."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Kefnet's Last Word
card.property: Gain control of target artifact, creature, or enchantment. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In his final moments, Kefnet reached into the minds of those around him, desperate for logic within the consuming chaos.

card.name: Nimble Obstructionist
card.property: Flash Flying Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Nimble Obstructionist, counter target activated or triggered ability you don't control.

card.name: Ominous Sphinx
card.property: Flying Whenever you cycle or discard a card, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sphinxes began to speak only after the Second Sun aligned. They whispered dire warnings, though no one listened.

card.name: Proven Combatant
card.property: Eternalize {4}{U}{U} ({4}{U}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not wise to keep glory waiting."

card.name: Riddleform
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Riddleform become a 3/3 Sphinx creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn. {2}{U}: Scry 1.

card.name: Seer of the Last Tomorrow
card.property: {U}, {T}, Discard a card: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The truth? It's been here all along. The Hours as we understood them are lies."

card.name: Sinuous Striker
card.property: {U}: Sinuous Striker gets +1/-1 until end of turn. Eternalize—{3}{U}{U}, Discard a card. ({3}{U}{U}, Discard a card, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Naga Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Spellweaver Eternal
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They were once our brothers and sisters."—Etha, former Rhet-crop initiate

card.name: Strategic Planning
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bolas remade this place in his image. He has the advantage here. We must approach carefully."—Jace Beleren

card.name: Striped Riverwinder
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The denizens of the Luxa River woke angry on the currents of blood.

card.name: Supreme Will
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Swarm Intelligence
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Locust God's children were numberless, relentlessly eating away every trace of the city's protection.

card.name: Tragic Lesson
card.property: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though Kefnet's followers feverishly searched his last words for some final riddle, they found only the gurgles of a dying god.

card.name: Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign
card.property: Flying Sphinx spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Whenever Unesh, Criosphinx Sovereign or another Sphinx enters the battlefield under your control, reveal the top four cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Unquenchable Thirst
card.property: Enchant creature When Unquenchable Thirst enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Unsummon
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skills mastered by initiates are preserved within cartouches, so Eternals remain adept at their preferred combat styles.

card.name: Vizier of the Anointed
card.property: When Vizier of the Anointed enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with eternalize or embalm, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle your library. Whenever you activate an eternalize or embalm ability, draw a card.

card.name: Accursed Horde
card.property: {1} {B}: Target attacking Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

card.name: Ammit Eternal
card.property: Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.) Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a -1/-1 counter on Ammit Eternal. Whenever Ammit Eternal deals combat damage to a player, remove all -1/-1 counters from it.

card.name: Apocalypse Demon
card.property: Flying Apocalypse Demon's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, tap Apocalypse Demon unless you sacrifice another creature.

card.name: Banewhip Punisher
card.property: When Banewhip Punisher enters the battlefield, you may put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. {B}, Sacrifice Banewhip Punisher: Destroy target creature that has a -1/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I die, it will not be alone."

card.name: Bontu's Last Reckoning
card.property: Destroy all creatures. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the last, Bontu wanted only to be first among the God-Pharaoh's subjects.

card.name: Carrion Screecher
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The banished have come home to roost.

card.name: Doomfall
card.property: Choose one — • Target opponent exiles a creature he or she controls. • Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This place has outlived its usefulness."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Dreamstealer
card.property: Menace Whenever Dreamstealer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards that many cards. Eternalize {4}{B}{B} ({4}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Human Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Grisly Survivor
card.property: Whenever you cycle or discard a card, Grisly Survivor gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No cartouches to earn. No afterlife to enter. Only the glory of a well-struck blow and the growing pile of felled enemies at her feet.

card.name: Hour of Glory
card.property: Exile target creature. If that creature was a God, its controller reveals his or her hand and exiles all cards from it with the same name as that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods of the trials also faced the opportunity to prove themselves worthy.

card.name: Khenra Eternal
card.property: Afflict 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For many years, servant mummies toiled in the mines to extract lazotep. The emergence of the Eternals revealed the sacred substance's true purpose.

card.name: Lethal Sting
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Lethal Sting, put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Initiates once believed defeat was the worst fate possible—a sentiment they quickly abandoned.

card.name: Liliana's Defeat
card.property: Destroy target black creature or black planeswalker. If that permanent was a Liliana planeswalker, her controller loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the power you have gathered for yourself, Liliana, I can take away."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Lurching Rotbeast
card.property: Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead that swept across Naktamun came in all shapes and sizes.

card.name: Marauding Boneslasher
card.property: Marauding Boneslasher can't block unless you control another Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Hekma destroyed, the wandering dead that sought entrance to Naktamun had free rein to lay waste to the city.

card.name: Merciless Eternal
card.property: Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.) {2}{B}, Discard a card: Merciless Eternal gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My work here is complete. The people have done everything required of them."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Moaning Wall
card.property: Defender Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before the monuments, before the first trials, before Naktamun itself, Bolas culled the plane of its adults in order to rebuild it for his own designs.

card.name: Razaketh, the Foulblooded
card.property: Flying, trample Pay 2 life, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Liliana insisted on coming to Amonkhet to confront one of the two remaining demons to whom she is bound.

card.name: Razaketh's Rite
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood ritual is complete. The end approaches."

card.name: Ruin Rat
card.property: Deathtouch When Ruin Rat dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From every shadow came the dull scratch of teeth on bones.

card.name: Scrounger of Souls
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yell for help, and that may answer.

card.name: Torment of Hailfire
card.property: Repeat the following process X times. Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

card.name: Torment of Scarabs
card.property: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player loses 3 life unless he or she sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a carpet unrolling for their god, the scarabs poured out from the necropolis.

card.name: Torment of Venom
card.property: Put three -1/-1 counters on target creature. Its controller loses 3 life unless he or she sacrifices another nonland permanent or discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Scorpion God's sting sends venom strong enough to poison blood, bone, and spirit.

card.name: Vile Manifestation
card.property: Vile Manifestation gets +1/+0 for each card with cycling in your graveyard. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The glyphs writhed and twisted, spewing out dark, vengeful magic.

card.name: Without Weakness
card.property: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.) Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Wretched Camel
card.property: When Wretched Camel dies, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfectly adapted to cross the wastes in life, they bring the wastes with them in death.

card.name: Abrade
card.property: Choose one — • Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature. • Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desert is a voracious beast, devouring both flesh and stone.

card.name: Blur of Blades
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Blur of Blades deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Samut battled her way through the hordes, shouting the names of those who'd died in her crop and those she hoped yet to save.

card.name: Burning-Fist Minotaur
card.property: First strike {1}{R}, Discard a card: Burning-Fist Minotaur gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no afterlife. Not for me, and not for you. So think again before getting in my way."

card.name: Chandra's Defeat
card.property: Chandra's Defeat deals 5 damage to target red creature or red planeswalker. If that permanent is a Chandra planeswalker, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire? Is that your only trick, Chandra?"—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Chaos Maw
card.property: When Chaos Maw enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each other creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The food chain doesn't end at sandwurms.

card.name: Crash Through
card.property: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have to get out of the city, Djeru. All of us! Gather as many as you can."—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There were those who saw the death of the gods and the city's collapse as a final test of worth. Some believed it meant the God-Pharaoh had been killed. Only a few realized they had been deceived.

card.name: Earthshaker Khenra
card.property: Haste When Earthshaker Khenra enters the battlefield, target creature with power less than or equal to Earthshaker Khenra's power can't block this turn. Eternalize {4}{R}{R} ({4}{R}{R}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Jackal Warrior with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Fervent Paincaster
card.property: {T}: Fervent Paincaster deals 1 damage to target player. {T}, Exert Fervent Paincaster: It deals 1 damage to target creature. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone here is a honed fighter. We'll respond the only way we know how."

card.name: Firebrand Archer
card.property: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Firebrand Archer deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A word of vengeance, and her arrows awaken in flame.

card.name: Frontline Devastator
card.property: Afflict 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 2 life.) {1}{R}: Frontline Devastator gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The God-Pharaoh's benevolence concealed the factory he created to produce an army of Eternals.

card.name: Gilded Cerodon
card.property: Whenever Gilded Cerodon attacks, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The plating of its horns is a token of honor from Hazoret, who favors creatures with great hearts.

card.name: Granitic Titan
card.property: Menace Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Hazoret's Undying Fury
card.property: Shuffle your library, then exile the top four cards. You may cast any number of nonland cards with converted mana cost 5 or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Hour of Devastation
card.property: All creatures lose indestructible until end of turn. Hour of Devastation deals 5 damage to each creature and each non-Bolas planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything here exists or perishes at my whim. Including you, Gatewatch."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Imminent Doom
card.property: Imminent Doom enters the battlefield with a doom counter on it. Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of doom counters on Imminent Doom, Imminent Doom deals that much damage to target creature or player. Then put a doom counter on Imminent Doom.

card.name: Inferno Jet
card.property: Inferno Jet deals 6 damage to target opponent. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the whole world is crazy, it's important to find something you can rely on."

card.name: Khenra Scrapper
card.property: Menace You may exert Khenra Scrapper as it attacks. When you do, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no tomorrow, so hold nothing back."

card.name: Kindled Fury
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The minotaur stared at the Eternal bearing down on him—the embodiment of deadly skill he had aspired to become.

card.name: Magmaroth
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on Magmaroth. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, remove a -1/-1 counter from Magmaroth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sand into glass and flesh into ash—such are the markers of its domain.

card.name: Manticore Eternal
card.property: Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.) Manticore Eternal attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While most Eternals were initiates who completed the trials, Bolas had plans for some of Amonkhet's other denizens.

card.name: Neheb, the Eternal
card.property: Afflict 3 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 3 life.) At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, add {R} to your mana pool for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is what glory looks like."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Open Fire
card.property: Open Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some khenra archers fashion their arrows with a personal touch.

card.name: Puncturing Blow
card.property: Puncturing Blow deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Neither the false God-Pharaoh nor his bugs will decide our fate."—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

card.name: Sand Strangler
card.property: When Sand Strangler enters the battlefield, if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, you may have Sand Strangler deal 3 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bombardment of sand disorients, chokes, and ultimately tenderizes its prey.

card.name: Thorned Moloch
card.property: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Thorned Moloch has first strike as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who fled the destruction of the city stumbled into the territory of their prickly neighbors.

card.name: Wildfire Eternal
card.property: Afflict 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, defending player loses 4 life.) Whenever Wildfire Eternal attacks and isn't blocked, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ambuscade
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Spent a lifetime learning from predators. Picked up a few tricks."

card.name: Beneath the Sands
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though buried and muffled, nature's whisper still called to Nissa.

card.name: Bitterbow Sharpshooters
card.property: Vigilance, reach

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember, brother, the eyes are always vulnerable.""I never forgot."

card.name: Devotee of Strength
card.property: {4} {G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Rhonas fell, his followers stirred with newfound strength—a final gift from a god they thought indomitable.

card.name: Dune Diviner
card.property: {1}, Tap an untapped Desert you control: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desert had once been a place of endless horror. It was now the last refuge as the city of Naktamun fell.

card.name: Feral Prowler
card.property: When Feral Prowler dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once favored companions, many cats were left to fend for themselves.

card.name: Frilled Sandwalla
card.property: {1} {G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It basks atop the rubble of Rhonas's monument, which still pulses with latent power.

card.name: Gift of Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What greater testament can there be to Rhonas's lessons?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She trusts that the potent poisons of her darts will reach the enemy before the enemy reaches her.

card.name: Hope Tender
card.property: {1}, {T}: Untap target land. {1}, {T}, Exert Hope Tender: Untap two target lands. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some refused to leave their shattered homes, vowing to rebuild at any cost.

card.name: Hour of Promise
card.property: Search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Then if you control three or more Deserts, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the Hekma breached and its protection removed, the deserts swept in.

card.name: Life Goes On
card.property: You gain 4 life. If a creature died this turn, you gain 8 life instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you believe the God-Pharaoh tests you, charge with me to prove yourself. If you believe he betrayed us all, join with me to fight for tomorrow!"—Samut, former Tah-crop initiate

card.name: Majestic Myriarch
card.property: Majestic Myriarch's power and toughness are each equal to twice the number of creatures you control. At the beginning of each combat, Majestic Myriarch gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Nissa's Defeat
card.property: Destroy target Forest, green enchantment, or green planeswalker. If that permanent was a Nissa planeswalker, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The soul of this world is gone, Nissa, and I would gladly kill it again."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Oasis Ritualist
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. {T}, Exert Oasis Ritualist: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's only the end if we allow it."

card.name: Overcome
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forward! Until the horizon is ours!"—Khemses, charioteer

card.name: Pride Sovereign
card.property: Pride Sovereign gets +1/+1 for each other Cat you control. {W}, {T}, Exert Pride Sovereign: Create two 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: Quarry Beetle
card.property: When Quarry Beetle enters the battlefield, you may return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ruin of the past is the topsoil of the future."—Sokar, former Nef-crop initiate

card.name: Rampaging Hippo
card.property: Trample Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Respect is earned through deeds—or the capacity to bite someone in half."—Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate

card.name: Ramunap Excavator
card.property: You may play land cards from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This world was once so much more than the confines of Naktamun."

card.name: Ramunap Hydra
card.property: Vigilance, reach, trample Ramunap Hydra gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Desert. Ramunap Hydra gets +1/+1 as long as there is a Desert card in your graveyard.

card.name: Resilient Khenra
card.property: When Resilient Khenra enters the battlefield, you may have target creature get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Resilient Khenra's power. Eternalize {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Jackal Wizard with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Rhonas's Last Stand
card.property: Create a 5/4 green Snake creature token. Lands you control don't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhonas continued to fight until his last breath and even beyond.

card.name: Rhonas's Stalwart
card.property: You may exert Rhonas's Stalwart as it attacks. When you do, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: Sidewinder Naga
card.property: As long as you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard, Sidewinder Naga gets +1/+0 and has trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who embrace the harsh land rather than fight it find they have a powerful ally."—Nissa Revane

card.name: Sifter Wurm
card.property: Trample When Sifter Wurm enters the battlefield, scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rhonas's monument belongs to the wurms now. Look elsewhere for refuge."—Arnun, vizier of the menagerie

card.name: Tenacious Hunter
card.property: As long as a creature has a -1/-1 counter on it, Tenacious Hunter has vigilance and deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crocodiles of the Broken Lands, long used to feeding on undead flesh, eagerly flooded into Naktamun for a taste of something fresher.

card.name: Uncage the Menagerie
card.property: Search your library for up to X creature cards with different names that each have converted mana cost X, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The destruction of Rhonas's monument released his collection upon the city.

card.name: Bloodwater Entity
card.property: Flying Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) When Bloodwater Entity enters the battlefield, you may put target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: The Locust God
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste. {2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh
card.property: +2: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of his or her library until he or she exiles a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. +1: Each opponent exiles two cards from his or her hand. −4: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent or creature an opponent controls. −12: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

card.name: Obelisk Spider
card.property: Reach Whenever Obelisk Spider deals combat damage to a creature, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. Whenever you put one or more -1/-1 counters on a creature, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Resolute Survivors
card.property: You may exert Resolute Survivors as it attacks. (It won't untap during your next untap step.) Whenever you exert a creature, Resolute Survivors deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are crops no longer. Reap elsewhere."

card.name: River Hoopoe
card.property: Flying {3}{G}{U}: You gain 2 life and draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a cruel thing to give such a sad song to such a colorful creature."—Sana, former Ahn-crop initiate

card.name: Samut, the Tested
card.property: +1: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn. −2: Samut, the Tested deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players. −7: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: The Scarab God
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control. {2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Scorpion God
card.property: Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card. {1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Unraveling Mummy

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are no longer in control." —Elekh, vizier of embalming

card.name: Farm // Market
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

alternate.name: Farm
alternate.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

alternate.name: Market
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

card.property: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Target opponent discards two cards.

alternate.property: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

alternate.name: Oblivion

card.property: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Struggle // Survive

alternate.property: Struggle deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

card.name: Appeal // Authority
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Tap up to two target creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

alternate.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control.

alternate.name: Authority
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Tap up to two target creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Leave // Chance
card.property: Return any number of target permanents you own to your hand. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

alternate.name: Leave
alternate.property: Return any number of target permanents you own to your hand.

alternate.name: Chance
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

card.name: Reason // Believe
card.property: Scry 3. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Look at the top card of your library. You may put it onto the battlefield if it's a creature card. If you don't, put it into your hand.

alternate.name: Reason
alternate.property: Scry 3.

alternate.name: Believe
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Look at the top card of your library. You may put it onto the battlefield if it's a creature card. If you don't, put it into your hand.

card.name: Grind // Dust
card.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Exile any number of target creatures that have -1/-1 counters on them.

alternate.name: Grind
alternate.property: Put a -1/-1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.

alternate.name: Dust
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Exile any number of target creatures that have -1/-1 counters on them.

card.name: Refuse // Cooperate
card.property: Refuse deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's converted mana cost. // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

alternate.name: Refuse
alternate.property: Refuse deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

alternate.name: Cooperate
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Driven // Despair
card.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card." // Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card."

alternate.name: Driven
alternate.property: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."

alternate.name: Despair
alternate.property: Aftermath (Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.) Until end of turn, creatures you control gain menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card."

card.name: Abandoned Sarcophagus
card.property: You may cast nonland cards with cycling from your graveyard. If a card with cycling would be put into your graveyard from anywhere and it wasn't cycled, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although long since dead, the banished dissenters finally took their vengeance.

card.name: Crook of Condemnation
card.property: {1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, Exile Crook of Condemnation: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The God-Pharaoh's angels stripped former initiates of their cartouches and the fortifying magic they provided.

card.name: Dagger of the Worthy
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has afflict 1. (Whenever it becomes blocked, defending player loses 1 life.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: God-Pharaoh's Gift
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Graven Abomination
card.property: Whenever Graven Abomination attacks, exile target card from defending player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ironically, the statues had been constructed as a warning.

card.name: Hollow One
card.property: Hollow One costs {2} less to cast for each card you've cycled or discarded this turn. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The embodiment of yearning, forever drifting the deserts to find what had once made it whole.

card.name: Manalith
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though the afterlife, the city, and even the God-Pharaoh himself were one great deception, the ideals championed by the gods remain true."—Djeru, former Tah-crop initiate

card.name: Mirage Mirror
card.property: {2}: Mirage Mirror becomes a copy of target artifact, creature, enchantment, or land until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most mirrors show your reflection. Others show your potential.

card.name: Sunset Pyramid
card.property: Sunset Pyramid enters the battlefield with three brick counters on it. {2}, {T}, Remove a brick counter from Sunset Pyramid: Draw a card. {2}, {T}: Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Decades to build. Hours to demolish.

card.name: Traveler's Amulet
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why wander in search of a new home when the path is laid out before you?"—Pytamun, former Nef-crop initiate

card.name: Wall of Forgotten Pharaohs
card.property: Defender {T}: Wall of Forgotten Pharaohs deals 1 damage to target player. Activate this ability only if you control a Desert or there is a Desert card in your graveyard.

card.name: Crypt of the Eternals
card.property: When Crypt of the Eternals enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead entered as worthy. They exited as Eternals.

card.name: Desert of the Fervent
card.property: Desert of the Fervent enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Desert of the Glorified
card.property: Desert of the Glorified enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Desert of the Indomitable
card.property: Desert of the Indomitable enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. Cycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Desert of the Mindful
card.property: Desert of the Mindful enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Cycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Desert of the True
card.property: Desert of the True enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Dunes of the Dead
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. When Dunes of the Dead is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Curse of Wandering permeated Amonkhet long before Nicol Bolas. He simply harnessed it.

card.name: Endless Sands
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Endless Sands: Return each creature card exiled with Endless Sands to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Hashep Oasis
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} to your mana pool. {1}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Hostile Desert
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, Exile a land card from your graveyard: Hostile Desert becomes a 3/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Amonkhet's desiccated land thirsts for blood.

card.name: Ifnir Deadlands
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} to your mana pool. {2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature an opponent controls. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Ipnu Rivulet
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {U} to your mana pool. {1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Ramunap Ruins
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {R} to your mana pool. {2}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Ramunap Ruins deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Scavenger Grounds
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all cards from all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the last scrap of flesh is scoured away, the Curse of Wandering ends. Then the dead may sleep.

card.name: Shefet Dunes
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {W} to your mana pool. {2}{W}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Survivors' Encampment
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What will happen to us?" they asked.The vizier paused. "I think . . . I think that's up to us now."

card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Nissa, Genesis Mage
card.property: +2: Untap up to two target creatures and up to two target lands. −3: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn. −10: Look at the top ten cards of your library. You may put any number of creature and/or land cards from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Avid Reclaimer
card.property: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All can't be lost. Nissa has shown me that."

card.name: Brambleweft Behemoth
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life will find a way, or it will make one.

card.name: Nissa's Encouragement
card.property: Search your library and graveyard for a card named Forest, a card named Brambleweft Behemoth, and a card named Nissa, Genesis Mage. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Woodland Stream
card.property: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bolas's power on this plane can't be absolute. Look around you."—Nissa Revane

card.name: Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver
card.property: +3: Each opponent loses 3 life unless that player sacrifices a nonland permanent or discards a card. −3: Destroy target creature. Draw a card. −11: Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver deals 7 damage to each opponent. You draw seven cards.

card.name: Wasp of the Bitter End
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a Bolas planeswalker spell, you may sacrifice Wasp of the Bitter End. If you do, destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Second Sun glided into its final position in the sky, a chorus of wings sounded to herald the return of Nicol Bolas.

card.name: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh
card.property: {4} {R}: Zealot of the God-Pharaoh deals 2 damage to target opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The God-Pharaoh's most devoted took it upon themselves to follow his example.

card.name: Visage of Bolas
card.property: When Visage of Bolas enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Nicol Bolas, the Deceiver, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Cinder Barrens
card.property: Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do as I choose with what is mine. And it is all mine."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Armageddon
card.property: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Capsize
card.property: Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Forbid
card.property: Buyback—Discard two cards. (You may discard two cards in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Counter target spell.

card.name: Omniscience
card.property: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Opposition
card.property: Tap an untapped creature you control: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Sunder
card.property: Return all lands to their owners' hands.

card.name: Threads of Disloyalty
card.property: Enchant creature with converted mana cost 2 or less You control enchanted creature.

card.name: Avatar of Woe
card.property: If there are ten or more creature cards total in all graveyards, Avatar of Woe costs {6} less to cast. Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) {T}: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Damnation
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Desolation Angel
card.property: Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.property: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Doomsday
card.property: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: No Mercy
card.property: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Slaughter Pact
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Boil
card.property: Destroy all Islands.

card.name: Shatterstorm
card.property: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Through the Breach
card.property: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step. Splice onto Arcane {2}{R}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Choke
card.property: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: The Locust God
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, create a 1/1 blue and red Insect creature token with flying and haste. {2}{U}{R}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When The Locust God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Lord of Extinction
card.property: Lord of Extinction's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in all graveyards.

card.name: The Scarab God
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control. {2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Scorpion God
card.property: Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card. {1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
